segments.text: Have you heard of the Love Bug ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you mean the ' I love you ' virus that attacks computers through e-mail ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . It is one of the most harmful computer viruses in the world . People say it will break out again om Valentines ' Day this year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is terrible . Why do hackers play such a dirty trick ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hackers are smart , and they want people to know about it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So they create viruses to tell people they are smart ? That's really sick .
segments.speaker: S2
